name: Les bronzés font du ski
storyline: Friends go to ski resort Val d'Isère (France) where Jérôme, Gigi and Popeye are working. Jérôme and Gigi are just married, Popeye is a Don Juan. Nathalie and Bernard have a flat in that resort. Jean-Claude is always looking for a girl friend, but he's not a lover. After reunion, they gone to a ski trip in mountain. Finally they're rescue by farmers who proposed some typical food. All along adventure, friends get funny problems.
